title: History of Windshield Wipers | Illuminating Moments in Ameri
description:
See more: http://TheBlaze.com/TV.

In 1903, Mary Anderson was taking a trip from Alabama to New York City. While her trolley was dealing with the bad weather, she came up with the idea for windshield wipers - and the invention changed automobiles forever.

asset.author: TheBlaze
asset.hookText:
See more: http://TheBlaze.com/TV.

In 1903, Mary Anderson was taking a trip from Alabama to New York City. While her trolley was dealing with the bad weather, she came up with the idea for windshield wipers - and the invention changed automobiles forever. This is an "illuminating moment in American history" (as first seen on TheBlaze TV show "Liberty Treehouse").
